Lamonte McLemore (amụrụ n'ọnwa Septemba 17, nke afọ 1939) bụ onye America na-agụ egwú, onye na-ede egwu, na onye na-ese foto
Ọ bụ onye guzobere The 5th Dimension, otu egwu a ma ama na ngwụcha afọ 1960 na mmalite afọ 1970.
McLemore lụrụ Lisa Harvey ma nwee nwa nwanyị aha ya bụ Ciara
N'afọ 2014, o dere ma bipụta akụkọ ndụ ya na Robert-Allan Arno, From the Hobo Flats to The 5th Dimension - A Life Fulfilled in Baseball, Photography, and Music.
Ọ bụ onye na-ese foto maka magazin Playboy, Ebony, Jet, People, na Harper's Bazaar.
McLemore bụ onye Afrịka Amerịka mbụ na-eme egwuregwu ịnwale maka St
Mgbe ọ kwagara Los Angeles, ọ bụ onye na-agba ọsọ na Los Angeles Dodgers n'oge dị mkpirikpi.
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị n'afọ 1952, McLemore debanyere aha na United States Navy, ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese foto n'elu
Ọ bụ onye guzobere Helmut Graphics, ma rụọ ọrụ n'ebe ahụ dị ka onye na-ese foto malite n'afọ 1958
McLemore bụ onye Afrịka Amerịka mbụ na-ese foto nke Harper's Bazaar magazine were n'ọrụ ma bụrụkwa onye na-ese ihe maka mkpuchi album mbụ nke Stevie Wonder
McLemore abụwo onye na-ese foto maka magazin Jet na Ebony ihe karịrị afọ iri anọ
Ọ bụ n'ihi foto ya na Miss Black Beauty Pageant n'etiti afọ 1960 ka ọ zutere Marilyn McCoo na Florence LaRue nke mechara mee ka e mepụta The 5th Dimension.
O so dee egwu abụọ nke The 5th Dimension dere, A Love Like Ours (ya na Bob Alcivar) na The Singer (ya na Elliot Willensky).
